processingCommand.script:
! Deploy failover modules
:SET &WMS_FAIL_DEPLOY#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_DEPLOY# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_DEPLOY#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_DEPLOY#  = "false"

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_DEPLOY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_DEPLOY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_FAIL_DEPLOY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_DEPLOY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_DEPLOY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_DEPLOY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_DEPLOY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_DEPLOY#,,WORKFLOW
